sourcesContent: import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { colourTemplate } from 'src/app/Interfaces/colours'; import { carouselModule } from 'src/app/Interfaces/moduleTemplates'; import { colours } from 'src/app/websiteData/colours'; @Component({ selector: 'app-carousel', templateUrl: './carousel.component.html', styleUrls: ['./carousel.component.css'] }) export class CarouselComponent { colours: colourTemplate = colours; currentPosition: number = 1; @Input() module: carouselModule = { type: 'carousel', backgroundColour: '', modules: [] } }
